QuestData.Title: The Warden's Time
QuestData.Description: <Erunak's image penetrates your mind.>$b$bYou have done well, $n, but more remains to be done.$b$bBefore moving on from this place, let us be sure that we leave it in disarray.$b$bFind the one who leads these naga and repay him for his misdeeds.
QuestData.LogDescription: Erunak Stonespeaker wants you to slay Warden Azjakir at The Clutch.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good that this operation has been undone.$b$bSoon, I must move on...
